Posts.Content: Sep 26, 2012 04:38PM RachelS wrote: Thanks for your reply. I needed just that push to keep my appointment with my breast surgeon:). Rachel
Posts.Title: to wait 6 months or not....... RachelS RachelS

Posts.Content: RachelS wrote: 38 yr old female and i was scheduled for an ultrasound guided biopsy last friday and also mri guided biopsy.  the 2 masses bx by ultrasound are benign.  one-fibroadenoma and one-fibrocystic changes.  woooohoooo!  the mri machine went down right after they gave me valium.  at least i was relaxed during my u/s guided bx:)  they planned on bx an area of non mass clumped enhancement by mri.  i have also had clusters of calcifications on my mammo that they are not able to do a stereotatic bx on due to their location in the breast (too far back).  the radiologist followed the calcs and there was no change in 3 months.  i did have some sticky spontaneous discharge that they cultured also.  inconclusive results, but did show red blood cells.  the radiologist feels comfy waiting 6 months and seeing if the clumped enhancement changes.  gyn wants me to see the breast surgeon.  i'm ready to take a break from all of it.  anyone have non mass clumped enhancement?  everything i google(which i need to stop doing that!) about clusters of calcs and clumped enhancement points to dcis.  wait 6 months and do the f/u mri and look for changes or see breast surgeon?????
